items.title: Auto Insert: Support for `articles by tag` element type
items.description: Introduced a new element type to automatically insert when rendering pages in Labrador. Configurable title and placement options.

items.title: Add download feature for `buttonlink` elements
items.description: Added the ability for users to download links directly using the button element.

items.title: Add paywall label option in article header
items.description: Introduced an option to display a paywall label in article header, making paid content clearer to users.

items.title: Improved styling for images in images
items.description: When styling an image with borders, gradients etc., the styles are now skipped for images within that image.

items.title: Add author page feature
items.description: Implemented dedicated author pages, allowing users to view articles by specific authors.

items.title: Article scroller: Add option to open articles in new tab
items.description: Added a setting to allow articles to be opened in a new browser tab.

items.title: Remove style tags in article preheader
items.description: Cleaned up preheader markup by removing unnecessary style tags for better HTML output.

items.title: Prevent default color in font style
items.description: Blocked the addition of color: default in font style to avoid validation errors.

items.title: Improved news sitemap
items.description: Introduced images in news sitemap generation to improve news article discoverability in search engines.

items.title: Improve styling for padded teasers
items.description: Refined the styling for teasers with padding to enhance visual consistency and user experience.

items.title: Unify push notification handling
items.description: Unified push notification logic for more reliable and maintainable notifications to CMS users.

items.title: Allow font family config to accept arrays
items.description: Enhanced font configuration to support arrays, allowing for more flexible font selections.

items.title: Disable automatic wildcard in editor article search
items.description: Added the configuration option `articleSearchWildcardDisabled` to disable automatic wildcard searching in the editor for more precise results in some languages.

items.title: Add tabs for tags and multiple sites in toplist
items.description: Updated toplist feature to introduce tabs for tags and support for several sites, improving content organization.

items.title: New feature: Gallery
items.description: Introduced a full view option for slideshows, enhancing the presentation of media in articles. Each slideshow can now display in a separate URL.

items.title: Reduce API calls when searching for articles
items.description: The article search in ArticlesLatest now uses a debounce mechanism, so API requests are only sent after users stop typing. This significantly reduces server load and improves user experience during article searches.

items.title: Add paywall class support
items.description: Introduced support for paywall classes. This makes it easier to manage different types of paywalls in Labrador CMS.

items.title: Sesamy: Remove body text for locked articles using proxy
items.description: Fixed the logic so that body text is removed for articles protected by proxy lock, using the new isProtected flag. This improves paywall handling for Sesamy users of Labrador CMS.
